attributes.action: dissolve parliament due to public mistrust in an irreparably corrupted political system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Parliament must be immediately dissolved to allow the public to pass judgement on their local representatives. Ideally we should return to a true democracy by selecting politicians from the general populace in a system similar to jury service. As politicians have proved themselves incapable of being considered a ‘profession’ we must seek the dissolution of parliament and take the responsibility of our governance away from self-serving oligarchs and assume it ourselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
